repnme.cdata!:
Colombia - Eighth Development Finance
            Companies Project

abstracts.cdata!:
Development of private industry through
            contribution of foreign exchange for loan and equity
            financing by Development Finance Companies of investment
            projects, including technology development and pollution
            contol, in manufacturing, mining and tourism. The entities
            involved in the Eighth Development Finance Companies Project
            have been carrying out industrial credit programs, as the
            one proposed, for several years with very satisfactory
            results. Consequently, no unusual risks are anticipated in
            attaining the objectives of the project.
